alternativeNames: Mucher, Walter Karl; Rottensteiner, Walter Karl
comments: Walter Karl Mucher changed his surname to Starmühler in 1993 and in 2012 to Rottensteiner.
examples: Aconitum tauricum subsp. laternarense (Degen & Gayer) Starm. in W.  Maurer, Fl. Steirmark, 1: 84 (1996).
source: IK db. First name from Fritschiana, 10: title page (1997). Full name from author's website. Date from Siegmund Seybold.
